chatfix.title: Chat Fix
chatfix.opt.dont_clear_history.tooltip: Prevents the chat history from being cleared when you change worlds.
chatfix.opt.compactchat.tooltip: Compacts duplicate messages into a single message.
chatfix.opt.compactchat.warning: This prevents the use of chat reporting, as it invalidates message signatures due to the removal of messages.
chatfix.opt.keep_message.tooltip: Keeps the message you were typing saved for next time, for example, you are killed or a server opens up a GUI.
chatfix.opt.chat_history_length.tooltip: The number of messages to keep in the chat menu (when you scroll up).
chatfix.opt.y_offset.tooltip: Offsets the chat up or down by this many pixels.
